titleStmt.title: Two letters sent from Amsterdam, and read in both Houses of Parliament the 11. of the present Iune Discovering to the Parliament, what courses are there taken for the raising of ammunition to be sent to the North: with the list of the particulars of the ammunition.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott and Iohn Wright,

notesStmt.note: A letter from a merchant describing the crown jewels pawned. Mr. J. Webster is buying ammunition, measuring mortars, &c. A list of the arms and ammunition bought is sent, .. -- Steele.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and Harvard University Library.
